mapper.insert:
insert into sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION
RES_NO,
RES_TYPE,
CHECK_IN_TIME,
CHECKED_OUT_TIME,
RES_PERSON_ORG_ID,
RES_PERSON_ID,
SIGNING_CENTER_ID,
RES_STATUS,
SCHEDULE_ID,
NUMBE_OF_ACCOMMODATE_PEOPLE,
CASE_CODE,
PROPERTY_ADDRESS,
SIGNING_CENTER,
NUMBER_OF_PARTICIPANTS,
TRANSACT_ITEM_CODE,
SPECIAL_REQUIREMENT,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATE_BY,
UPDATE_TIME,
UPDATE_BY,
SERVICE_SPECIALIST,
RES_PERSON_MOBILE,
RES_PERSON_NAME,
IS_DELETE,
#{resNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{checkInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{checkedOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{resPersonOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resPersonId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{signingCenterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{resStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scheduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{numberOfPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{propertyAddress,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{signingCenter,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{numberOfParticipants,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{transactItemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{specialRequirement,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serviceSpecialist,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resPersonMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resPersonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM sctrans.SYS_ORG WHERE ORG_CODE = (select YU_TEAM_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_TEAM_SCOPE_TARGET where GRP_CODE = #{grpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR});
mapper.update: UPDATE sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION SET SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},NUMBE_OF_ACCOMMODATE_PEOPLE = #{numberOfPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID} WHERE PKID = #{resId,jdbcType=BIGINT};
UPDATE sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION SET RES_STATUS = '4',UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID} WHERE PKID = #{resId,jdbcType=BIGINT};
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT TRADE_CENTER_ID FROM sctrans.T_RM_SIGN_ROOM_ORG_MAPPING WHERE TEAM_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM sctrans.SYS_ORG WHERE ORG_CODE IN (SELECT YU_TEAM_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TS_TEAM_SCOPE_TARGET WHERE GRP_CODE = #{grpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}));
mapper.update: UPDATE sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION SET RES_STATUS = '1',CHECK_IN_TIME = GETDATE() , UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID} WHERE PKID = #{resId,jdbcType=BIGINT};

UPDATE sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION SET RES_STATUS = #{resStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},CHECKED_OUT_TIME = #{checkedOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID} WHERE PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT};
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION T INNER JOIN sctrans.T_RM_ROOM_SCHEDULE R ON R.PKID = T.SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN sctrans.T_RM_SIGN_ROOM S ON S.PKID = R.ROOM_ID WHERE (R.START_DATE>=GETDATE() OR (R.START_DATE < GETDATE() AND R.END_DATE >= GETDATE() AND DATEDIFF(mi,t.CREATE_TIME,GETDATE()) < 30 )) AND S.IS_DELETE = 0 AND T.RES_STATUS IN ('0','1') and T.IS_DELETE = 0
AND s.PKID = #{pkid}

SELECT count(*) FROM sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION r LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RM_ROOM_SCHEDULE rs ON r.SCHEDULE_ID = rs.PKID WHERE (r.RES_STATUS = 0 OR r.RES_STATUS = 3 OR r.RES_STATUS = 4) and r.IS_DELETE = 0 AND CONVERT(varchar(100), rs.START_DATE, 23) >= CONVERT(varchar(100),DateAdd(dd,-7,getdate()),23) AND CONVERT(varchar(100), rs.START_DATE, 23) <= CONVERT(varchar(100),DateAdd(dd,6,getdate()),23) AND r.RES_PERSON_ID = #{currentUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

SELECT rs.PKID AS scheduleId,sr.PKID AS roomId,sr.ROOM_NO AS roomNo,sr.ROOM_TYPE AS roomType FROM sctrans.T_RM_SIGN_ROOM sr LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RM_ROOM_SCHEDULE rs ON rs.ROOM_ID = sr.PKID WHERE sr.IS_DELETE = 0 and rs.IS_DELETE = 0 AND rs.USE_STATUS = 'N' AND rs.START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND rs.END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sr.TRADE_CENTER_ID = #{tradeCenterId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and sr.PKID not in ( SELECT DISTINCT rs1.ROOM_ID FROM sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION r1 LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RM_ROOM_SCHEDULE rs1 ON r1.SCHEDULE_ID = rs1.PKID WHERE r1.IS_DELETE = 0 and (r1.RES_STATUS = '1' OR r1.RES_STATUS = '0') AND rs1.START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND rs1.END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and r1.SIGNING_CENTER_ID = #{tradeCenterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}) AND sr.NUMBE_OF_ACCOMMODATE_PEOPLE = #{numberOfPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.update: UPDATE sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION SET SCHEDULE_ID = #{scheduleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},NUMBE_OF_ACCOMMODATE_PEOPLE = #{numberOfPeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID} WHERE PKID = #{resId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.select: SELECT T.PKID AS scheduleId , T.ROOM_ID AS roomId , T.START_DATE AS startDate, T.END_DATE AS endDate, T.USE_STATUS AS useStatus, R.RES_STATUS AS resStatus, R.CHECK_IN_TIME AS checkInTime, R.CHECKED_OUT_TIME AS checkOutTime, R.CREATE_TIME AS createTime FROM sctrans.T_RM_ROOM_SCHEDULE T LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION R ON T.RES_ID = R.PKID AND R.IS_DELETE = 0 WHERE T.IS_DELETE = '0' AND T.START_DATE = #{beginResTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.END_DATE = #{endResTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ROOM_ID = #{roomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: UPDATE sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION SET RES_STATUS = #{resStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},CHECK_IN_TIME = #{checkInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID} WHERE PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT};
UPDATE sctrans.T_RM_RESERVATION SET IS_DELETE = 1,UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID} WHERE PKID = #{resId,jdbcType=BIGINT};
